mapper.select: select * from tbl_item where item_no = #{itemNo} and is_disabled = 0

select a.item_no item_no ,a.item_name item_name ,a.item_price item_price ,a.item_image item_image from ( select i.item_no ,i.item_name ,i.item_price ,i.item_image from tbl_item i join tbl_line l on i.line_no = l.line_no where (l.line_no = #{lineNo} OR l.line_parent_no = #{lineNo}) and i.is_disabled = 0 and l.is_disabled = 0 order by i.line_no )a
where rownum <= 8

select a.prd_code prd_code ,a.prd_name prd_name ,a.prd_desc prd_desc ,a.origin_price origin_price ,a.sale_price sale_price ,a.star_point star_point ,a.prod_image prod_image ,a.creation_date creation_date from ( select prd_code ,prd_name ,prd_desc ,origin_price ,sale_price ,star_point ,prod_image ,creation_date
from product_tbl order by prd_code )a
where rownum <= 4
